links.title: Goldman Sachs: "Keep calm and carry on (investing). There's No Bubble In Tech Stocks"
links.description: Bursa & Investitii | 8 views Stocks of Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Microsoft and Google's parent, Alphabet (a.k.a. the "FAAMG" stocks), have run up in recent years, with a few of the tech behemoths close to becoming the world's first trillion-dollar company. Currently, the total value of FAAMG stocks is greater than Germany's annual economic output.

messages.body: $AAPL Hedge Fund Manager Predicts Apple, Microsoft Will Go Higher https://www.forbes.com/sites/lcarrel/2018/06/05/hedge-fund-manager-predicts-apple-microsoft-will-go-higher/?ss=logistics-transport

links.title: Hedge Fund Manager Predicts Apple, Microsoft Will Go Higher
links.description: Jon Ball, chief investment officer of the Intrinsic Asset Fund, predicts the Dow Jones Industrial Average will rise to 30,000 in the next 18 months. He sees a lot of growth in technology, especially cloud computing, and some of his favorite stocks are Apple, Microsoft, and Phillips 66.
